content: the macey ann square is the second in a series designed as a legacy for my grandchildren this square represents macey s unique creativity and love of everything pretty and sparkly this floral design can be replicated to make a blanket for any baby or sweet child to treasure forever it will also work well for the center square of a larger blanket both mini and large size squares are included gauge is not important so use any yarn and applicable hook that you please the difficulty level is intermediate the 11 revised square has 39 stitches per side **order the ultimate granny square sourcebook at meteoor books 1 ** **join my facebook group ~ a yarn of serendipity crochet group 2 links to all my patterns are found on my blog 3 or pinterest 4 ** 1 http //www allcrochetpatterns net/books/the-ultimate-granny-square-sourcebook/ partner=ayarnofserendipity 2 https //www facebook com/groups/www ayarnofserendipity 3 http //pknightonhaener wordpress com 4 https //pin it/g7fcaloku2wutj
